The Buner district is the hardest hit, with rescue operations severely hampered by washed-out roads and ongoing heavy rainfall. With more rain expected, officials fear the situation will worsen in the climate-vulnerable nation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/pakistan-floods-leave-344-dead-helicopter-crash-mass-funerals-widespread-destruction-deepen-crisis-top-developments/articleshow/123333738.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/pakistan-floods-leave-344-dead-helicopter-crash-mass-funerals-widespread-destruction-deepen-crisis-top-developments/articleshow/123333738.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 17:15:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="236836" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333835,imgsize-236836.cms"/></item><item><title>Close call: IndiGo flight suffers tail strike; plane lands in 2nd attempt</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/yet-again-indigo-a321-suffers-tail-strike-in-mumbai-during-go-around-in-heavy-rain/articleshow/123332921.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/yet-again-indigo-a321-suffers-tail-strike-in-mumbai-during-go-around-in-heavy-rain/articleshow/123332921.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 15:59:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="564556" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123332918,imgsize-564556.cms"/></item><item><title>'Trump's tariffs on India stupid': US economist Sachs' key message for New Delhi</title><description><![CDATA[Economist Jeffrey Sachs criticizes Donald Trump's tariff policies as detrimental to the US economy and a violation of international law, warning of potential legal challenges and geopolitical isolation. Sachs suggests Trump's actions stem from a desire to dominate other nations, particularly BRICS countries, and a flawed approach to the Russia-Ukraine conflict.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trumps-tariffs-on-india-stupid-us-economist-jeffrey-sachs-gets-blunt-his-key-message-to-new-delhi/articleshow/123334368.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trumps-tariffs-on-india-stupid-us-economist-jeffrey-sachs-gets-blunt-his-key-message-to-new-delhi/articleshow/123334368.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 18:43:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="773432" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123334623,imgsize-773432.cms"/></item><item><title>‘16 days, 23 districts’: Rahul Gandhi launches 'Vote Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar</title><description><![CDATA[Rahul Gandhi launched the "Vote Adhikar Yatra" in Bihar, protesting alleged voter roll manipulation by the Election Commission ahead of state elections. The 16-day yatra, supported by Mahagathbandhan allies, aims to raise awareness and protect voting rights. Tejashwi Yadav emphasized ensuring no voter is excluded, while Gandhi accuses the EC of collusion with the BJP, a claim the EC denies.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/16-days-23-districts-rahul-gandhi-launches-vote-adhikar-yatra-in-bihar-india-allies-to-join/articleshow/123334457.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/16-days-23-districts-rahul-gandhi-launches-vote-adhikar-yatra-in-bihar-india-allies-to-join/articleshow/123334457.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 18:20:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="734952" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123334451,imgsize-734952.cms"/></item><item><title>'Two or three weeks': Trump on slapping China with Russian oil tariff</title><description><![CDATA[US President Donald Trump has indicated potential retaliatory tariffs on China for its Russian oil purchases, following similar actions against India. While immediate measures are not planned, Trump suggested they could be implemented in the coming weeks if the Ukraine war persists.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/tariff-tantrums-after-india-china-next-to-feel-us-secondary-tariffs-over-russian-oil-two-or-three-weeks-warns-donald-trump/articleshow/123334041.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/tariff-tantrums-after-india-china-next-to-feel-us-secondary-tariffs-over-russian-oil-two-or-three-weeks-warns-donald-trump/articleshow/123334041.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 17:48:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2280282" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123334156,imgsize-2280282.cms"/></item><item><title>Satya Nadella: Bill Gates’ vision guided us for decades, but...</title><description><![CDATA[Satya Nadella declared Microsoft's need for reinvention in the age of AI, moving beyond Bill Gates' software factory vision. Despite record financial performance and workforce reductions, Microsoft aims to empower 8 billion people with AI tools. The company is restructuring around security, quality, and AI transformation, envisioning a future where everyone has access to AI agents.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-ceo-satya-nadella-bill-gates-vision-has-guided-us-for-decades-but-today-its-no-longer-enough-as/articleshow/123318036.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-ceo-satya-nadella-bill-gates-vision-has-guided-us-for-decades-but-today-its-no-longer-enough-as/articleshow/123318036.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 11:32:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="27938" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123318023,imgsize-27938.cms"/></item><item><title>'Set this book on fire': Congress slams NCERT Partition module; BJP hits back</title><description><![CDATA[A political clash erupted between Congress and BJP. This happened after NCERT released new modules on Partition. The modules placed blame on Congress. Congress refuted the claims. They accused Hindu Mahasabha and Muslim League of collaboration. BJP accused Congress of avoiding inconvenient history. NCERT stated Congress accepted Partition plans. They underestimated Jinnah.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/set-this-book-on-fire-congress-slams-ncert-partition-module-bjp-hits-back/articleshow/123334012.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/set-this-book-on-fire-congress-slams-ncert-partition-module-bjp-hits-back/articleshow/123334012.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 17:30:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1046351" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123334008,imgsize-1046351.cms"/></item><item><title>'Frustrating, but ...': Karun Nair on England tour; lauds Gill, Gambhir for clarity</title><description><![CDATA[India batter Karun Nair reflected on a bittersweet Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy series in England, acknowledging his frustration at not converting starts into big scores despite batting well. He took pride in India's 2-2 series draw against England, crediting the team's resilience and clear messaging from captain Shubman Gill and coach Gautam Gambhir.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/frustrating-but-lesson-learned-karun-nair-reflects-on-england-tour-lauds-shubman-gill-gautam-gambhir-for-clarity/articleshow/123334366.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/frustrating-but-lesson-learned-karun-nair-reflects-on-england-tour-lauds-shubman-gill-gautam-gambhir-for-clarity/articleshow/123334366.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 18:11:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45280" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123334376,imgsize-45280.cms"/></item><item><title>Alaska meet: Putin reveals US-Russia trade grew by 20% under Trump</title><description><![CDATA["Incidentally, when the new administration came to power (in the US), bilateral trade started to grow. It's still very symbolic. Still, we have a growth of 20 per cent," Putin said.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/alaska-meet-vladimir-putin-reveals-us-russia-trade-grew-by-20-after-trump-came-to-power-again-calls-for-wider-cooperation/articleshow/123334346.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/alaska-meet-vladimir-putin-reveals-us-russia-trade-grew-by-20-after-trump-came-to-power-again-calls-for-wider-cooperation/articleshow/123334346.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 18:18:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="944945" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123334393,imgsize-944945.cms"/></item><item><title>Apple founder Steve Jobs lived by the rule that God is in …</title><description><![CDATA[Steve Jobs, the Apple founder, was a firm believer in the philosophy that "God is in the details," shaping Apple's DNA through meticulous attention to even the smallest design elements. His relentless pursuit of perfection, extending to hidden components, pushed teams to innovate and create exceptional products.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/apple-founder-steve-jobs-lived-by-the-rule-that-god-is-in-/articleshow/123320306.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/apple-founder-steve-jobs-lived-by-the-rule-that-god-is-in-/articleshow/123320306.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 14:36:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="70230" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123320303,imgsize-70230.cms"/></item><item><title>GST 2.0: 'What Rahul says, happens' - Cong claims credit for PM Modi's Diwali gift</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Modi's Independence Day announcement of a simplified GST structure, dubbed GST 2.0, aiming for cheaper daily-use items, has sparked a political clash. The Congress party claims the idea as their own, referencing their 2024 manifesto and Rahul Gandhi's past calls for similar reforms.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/gst-reforms-centre-mulls-2-slab-tax-structure-congress-claims-credit-cites-rahul-gandhis-2018-tweet/articleshow/123333982.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/gst-reforms-centre-mulls-2-slab-tax-structure-congress-claims-credit-cites-rahul-gandhis-2018-tweet/articleshow/123333982.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 17:55:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="934787" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123334222,imgsize-934787.cms"/></item><item><title>'We wish Ukraine...': PM Modi thanks Zelenskyy for Independence Day greetings</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi expressed gratitude to Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy for his Independence Day greetings, emphasizing the commitment to strengthen bilateral ties and hoping for peace in Ukraine.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/we-wish-ukraine-pm-modi-thanks-zelenskyy-for-independence-day-greetings-calls-for-closer-ties/articleshow/123334320.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/we-wish-ukraine-pm-modi-thanks-zelenskyy-for-independence-day-greetings-calls-for-closer-ties/articleshow/123334320.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 18:19:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="21642" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123334433,imgsize-21642.cms"/></item><item><title>Elon Musk may be right when he told Mark Zuckerberg that Meta engineers are joining xAI</title><description><![CDATA[Elon Musk claims xAI is attracting top engineers from Meta and Google with its "hyper merit-based" culture, not just high salaries. A report indicates xAI has hired at least 40 former Google employees since 2023, supporting Musk's claim. Despite some departures, xAI's demanding environment and ambitious mission continue to attract talent.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/how-elon-musk-may-be-right-when-he-told-mark-zuckerberg-many-top-engineers-of-meta-are-joining-my-ai-company-xai-and-i-am-paying-them-/articleshow/123331989.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/how-elon-musk-may-be-right-when-he-told-mark-zuckerberg-many-top-engineers-of-meta-are-joining-my-ai-company-xai-and-i-am-paying-them-/articleshow/123331989.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 14:33:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="16884" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123331997,imgsize-16884.cms"/></item><item><title>Asia Cup: Former batter shocks by leaving Gill out of playing XI; check full team</title><description><![CDATA[Mohammad Kaif has unveiled his predicted India squad for the Asia Cup 2025, sparking debate by including Shubman Gill in the 15-member team but excluding him from the playing XI. Kaif's surprising choices feature Sanju Samson and Abhishek Sharma as openers, with Suryakumar Yadav leading the side and Axar Patel as vice-captain.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/indias-squad-for-asia-cup-2025-former-batter-shocks-by-leaving-shubman-gill-out-of-his-playing-xi-check-full-team/articleshow/123334067.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/indias-squad-for-asia-cup-2025-former-batter-shocks-by-leaving-shubman-gill-out-of-his-playing-xi-check-full-team/articleshow/123334067.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 17:44:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="33636" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123334136,imgsize-33636.cms"/></item><item><title>'Pursuit of peace highly commendable': India's first reaction to Trump-Putin talks</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pursuit-of-peace-highly-commendable-indias-first-reaction-to-trump-putin-meeting-want-to-see-early-end-to-ukraine-conflict/articleshow/123333081.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pursuit-of-peace-highly-commendable-indias-first-reaction-to-trump-putin-meeting-want-to-see-early-end-to-ukraine-conflict/articleshow/123333081.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 16:13:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="795682" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333088,imgsize-795682.cms"/></item><item><title>After US, is UK also losing its appeal for Indian students? Visa data suggests so</title><description><![CDATA[Indian mobility to the UK is witnessing a steep decline, with Home Office data showing work visas for Indians halved to 81,463 in 2024 and student visas dropping 42% from the previous year. Policy shifts, including salary hikes and restrictions on dependants, are reshaping choices, pushing Indian students and professionals to reconsider Britain as a destination.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/study-abroad/after-the-us-is-the-uk-also-losing-its-appeal-for-indian-students-and-professionals-the-visa-data-suggests-so/articleshow/123333381.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/study-abroad/after-the-us-is-the-uk-also-losing-its-appeal-for-indian-students-and-professionals-the-visa-data-suggests-so/articleshow/123333381.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 16:40:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TRISHA TEWARI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2063798" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333362,imgsize-2063798.cms"/></item><item><title>Straight to peace deal? Trump to meet Zelenskyy; will talk to Putin 'if all works out'</title><description><![CDATA[Following a meeting in Alaska, President Trump announced his preference for a direct peace agreement to end the Russia-Ukraine war, rather than a ceasefire. Zelenskyy is scheduled to visit Washington D.C. on Monday, with a potential meeting with Putin to follow if discussions progress positively. Both leaders have expressed openness to negotiations, signaling a potential path toward resolving the conflict.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/ukraine-russia-war-no-ceasefire-straight-to-peace-deal-donald-trump-sets-lofty-goal-to-meet-zelenskyy-may-talk-to-putin-again-if-all-works-out/articleshow/123332189.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/ukraine-russia-war-no-ceasefire-straight-to-peace-deal-donald-trump-sets-lofty-goal-to-meet-zelenskyy-may-talk-to-putin-again-if-all-works-out/articleshow/123332189.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 14:59:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="59444" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123332241,imgsize-59444.cms"/></item><item><title>Serious Injury Replacement: BCCI introduces new rule after Pant's injury</title><description><![CDATA[The BCCI has introduced a "Serious Injury Replacement" rule for multi-day domestic cricket starting in the 2025-26 season, prompted by injuries in the recent India-England series. This allows teams to replace players injured by external blows, like fractures, with like-for-like substitutes approved by the match referee. While welcomed by some, like India's coach Gautam Gambhir, the rule has faced criticism.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/serious-injury-replacement-bcci-introduces-new-rule-after-rishabh-pants-injury-in-andersontendulkar-trophy/articleshow/123333180.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/serious-injury-replacement-bcci-introduces-new-rule-after-rishabh-pants-injury-in-andersontendulkar-trophy/articleshow/123333180.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 16:26:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="83376" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333224,imgsize-83376.cms"/></item><item><title>Mission Sudarshan Chakra: Multi-layered air & missile shield with offensive weapons</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mission-sudarshan-chakra-multi-layered-air-missile-shield-integrated-with-offensive-weapons/articleshow/123328590.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mission-sudarshan-chakra-multi-layered-air-missile-shield-integrated-with-offensive-weapons/articleshow/123328590.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 08:54:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAJAT PANDIT</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="566291" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328621,imgsize-566291.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Ouch! Fan crashes into the fence while trying to catch Brevis six</title><description><![CDATA[Dewald Brevis's explosive innings, featuring audacious no-look sixes, electrified the Australia-South Africa T20I. One fan's eagerness to catch a souvenir resulted in a comical collision with the boundary fence, quickly going viral. Brevis's 53 off 26 balls propelled South Africa to a competitive total, providing entertainment both on and off the field.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-ouch-fan-crashes-into-the-fence-while-trying-to-catch-a-massive-dewald-brevis-six-during-aus-vs-sa-3rd-t20i/articleshow/123333586.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-ouch-fan-crashes-into-the-fence-while-trying-to-catch-a-massive-dewald-brevis-six-during-aus-vs-sa-3rd-t20i/articleshow/123333586.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 17:29:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44936" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333999,imgsize-44936.cms"/></item><item><title>Arjun follows in parents Sachin-Anjali's footsteps after engagement with Saaniya</title><description><![CDATA[Arjun Tendulkar, son of Sachin Tendulkar, is engaged to Sanniya Chandhok on August 13, 2025. The couple's age difference mirrors Sachin's marriage to Anjali, who was older than him. Arjun, a cricketer, follows in his father's footsteps both on and off the field, embracing a relationship that defies societal norms, much like his father did.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/arjun-tendulkar-follows-in-parents-sachin-anjalis-footsteps-following-engagement-with-saaniya-chandhok/articleshow/123333239.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/arjun-tendulkar-follows-in-parents-sachin-anjalis-footsteps-following-engagement-with-saaniya-chandhok/articleshow/123333239.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 16:32:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="63246" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333298,imgsize-63246.cms"/></item><item><title>Ukraine-Russia war: EU leaders back Zelenskyy’s right to choose alliances</title><description><![CDATA[European leaders affirmed that Russia cannot dictate Ukraine's alliances. This came after talks between Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin failed to end the Ukraine war. Europe pledged to support Ukraine's right to choose its future. Trump aimed for a deal, but key issues remained unresolved. Putin welcomed the talks and called for cooperation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/ukraine-russia-war-eu-leaders-back-zelenskyys-right-to-choose-alliances-push-for-continued-sanctions-on-moscow/articleshow/123332838.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/ukraine-russia-war-eu-leaders-back-zelenskyys-right-to-choose-alliances-push-for-continued-sanctions-on-moscow/articleshow/123332838.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 16:10:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="820896" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123333025,imgsize-820896.cms"/></item><item><title>'Chess doesn't fit women properly': How Divya plans to defy Kasparov's 36-yo remark</title><description><![CDATA[In 1989, Garry Kasparov claimed women were weaker fighters in chess. Judit Polgar proved him wrong, crossing 2700. Now, 19-year-old Divya Deshmukh, fresh off her Women’s World Cup triumph and Grandmaster title, is stepping into the Open Grand Swiss 2025. Afridi's initial taunt led to a verbal altercation, escalating when Pathan jokingly inquired about dog meat, implying Afridi had consumed it.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/tu-kab-se-mera-baap-ban-gaya-how-irfan-pathan-shut-an-abusive-shahid-afridi-up-completely/articleshow/123329813.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/tu-kab-se-mera-baap-ban-gaya-how-irfan-pathan-shut-an-abusive-shahid-afridi-up-completely/articleshow/123329813.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 11:29:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="46848" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123329967,imgsize-46848.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Ordered milk, lost Rs 18.5 lakh’: Mumbai woman duped in online scam</title><description><![CDATA[A 71-year-old woman in Mumbai was defrauded of Rs 18.5 lakh after attempting to order milk online. She received a call from a scammer posing as a milk company executive, who tricked her into clicking a link and sharing her banking details. Consequently, the fraudster emptied her three bank accounts, leading to a significant financial loss.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ordered-milk-lost-rs-18-5-lakh-mumbai-woman-duped-in-online-scam-clicking-link-exposed-bank-accounts/articleshow/123330800.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ordered-milk-lost-rs-18-5-lakh-mumbai-woman-duped-in-online-scam-clicking-link-exposed-bank-accounts/articleshow/123330800.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 12:38:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="114372" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123330856,imgsize-114372.cms"/></item><item><title>'Will you stop killing civilians?': How reporters put Putin on the spot with questions in Alaska; watch</title><description><![CDATA[In Alaska, President Trump and President Putin engaged in over two and a half hours of discussions primarily focused on the Russia-Ukraine war. Putin faced pointed questions from reporters about civilian casualties and trust. Following the talks, both leaders expressed optimism about a potential path to peace in Ukraine, though specifics of their agreement remained undisclosed.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/will-you-stop-killing-civilians-how-reporters-put-putin-on-the-spot-with-tough-questions-in-alaska-watch/articleshow/123328429.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/will-you-stop-killing-civilians-how-reporters-put-putin-on-the-spot-with-tough-questions-in-alaska-watch/articleshow/123328429.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 08:55:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="653775" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328411,imgsize-653775.cms"/></item><item><title>'Not like they wanted to leave': Ex-India bowler on Kohli, Rohit retirements</title><description><![CDATA[Karsan Ghavri alleges that Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma were compelled to retire prematurely from Test cricket due to internal politics within the BCCI and the selection committee. Ghavri claims that both players desired to continue playing, but were forced out, and Kohli was not even given a farewell.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/not-like-they-wanted-to-leave-ex-india-bowler-drops-bombshell-on-virat-kohli-rohit-sharma-retirements/articleshow/123329393.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/not-like-they-wanted-to-leave-ex-india-bowler-drops-bombshell-on-virat-kohli-rohit-sharma-retirements/articleshow/123329393.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 10:36:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="60860" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123329454,imgsize-60860.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[India-China direct flights resumption likely to boost trade, tourism and economic ties]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/india-china-flights-resumption-economic-ties-impact-19653647.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India and China are set to resume direct passenger flights after five years, a move expected to boost trade, tourism, and economic ties. The resumption comes amid growing diplomatic engagement, recent trade approvals, and ahead of Prime Minister Modi’s visit to China for the SCO Summit. Pre-pandemic, over 8 lakh passengers traveled annually between the two countries, with cargo flows also significant. Restoring direct flights is likely to reignite strong demand, supporting business, tourism, and people-to-people exchanges.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[On average in India, a senior First Officer earns about ₹5 lakh a month.       <description><![CDATA[Experts say proposed changes to the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code will only work if backed by a functional framework, not left to court-driven resolutions.       <title><![CDATA[Dashverse to invest $13 million Series A funding in AI R&D to build India’s leading creator ecosystem]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/dashverse-series-a-funding-ai-powered-tools-dashreels-creator-ecosystem-india-19652864.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Dashverse, an AI-driven entertainment startup, is set to invest 60-70% of its recent $13 million Series A funding into advanced AI research and development. With its microdrama app Dashreels surpassing 5 million downloads in just a month and ranking third on the Google Play Store, the company aims to build India’s leading AI creator ecosystem. CEO Sanidhya Narain highlighted the goal of delivering seamless storytelling through AI, tackling challenges like character consistency. Beyond consumer apps, Dashverse also offers AI-powered tools to help creators produce serialised content, aiming to democratise content creation via a thriving two-sided marketplace.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[The acquisitions, expected to be completed by November 15, 2025, will add significantly to IHCL’s portfolio.
